snippet.title: Raiden IV: OverKill (Japan trailer)
snippet.description: The all-time classic top-down, vertical scrolling shooter series will debut on PS3 via PSN in North America on April 29th with Raiden IV: OverKill.  Featuring the brand new OverKill Mode with new mission stages and a revamped scoring system.  Also includes the previously released DLC items.
